channel.title: Is this even possible?
channel.description:
well it's something i've never seen on another server.. and i thought it would be pretty insane.
and thats breaking barrows when dropped/pked :rolleyes:
is there any way i can make this possible? so when somebody is wearing a piece of barrows, and die with it the barrows will become broken and you will need to go to a place to repair it.
if you wish you can add my msn to help me - can-i-eat-.-u@hotmail.com
thanks :)

item.title: Is this even possible?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

There has been people trying this, and it is 100% possible, i suggest using a handler… As for help making one, i dont think anyone will spoonfeed you and give you one. Because this hasn’t been posted before… Oh wait… A degrading barrows has been posted before, but it was so (Censor)… It logged you everytime you get hit. Lol, try it, ill help as much as i can… (Pm me if you need)

Read full topic

item.title: Is this even possible?
item.dc:creator: @SmokeSome SmokeSome
item.description:
@SmokeSome wrote:

well, im not a great coder yet and i know silab doesn’t run a server. and will block people who ask about servers.

i’ve learned about a few things, but booleans isn’t one of em lol. so anybody else who can do this want to help?

ask somone that is really good like silab i dont think it would be very hard like a boolean say
if player dies
and holding objid= # of barrows
then replave tht with barrows of 0%
